properties.title: Properties
properties.properties_tooltip: The various fields associated with each image
properties.linked_property_tooltip: Property linked to an image instance, for more information read the documentation on instances
properties.hidden_property_tooltip: This property is not visible in this mode because it is linked to an image instance

computed.title: Panoptic properties
computed.1_tooltip: A unique signature, two perfectly identical images will have the same sha1
computed.2_tooltip: An average signature, two images very close visually will have the same ahash

menu.search_tooltip: Search for images matching the text using the CLIP template
menu.image_mode_tooltip: Switch between instance and image modes, in image mode, only properties common to all instances of an image will be displayed.

sort.title: Sort:
sort.group_order_nb_tooltip: Sort groups by number of images

recommand.title: Image suggestions
recommand.tooltip: Images considered to be visually and/or semantically related

view.group_clusters_tooltip: Uses a machine learning algorithm (Kmeans) to propose temporary groups by image similarity. See the documentation on clusters for more information.
view.cluster_score_tooltip: Cluster consistency score. See cluster documentation for more information
view.instances_tooltip: Number of instances of this image

add_folder.title: Select the folder you want to add images from

image.similar_images_tooltip: Images considered to be visually and/or semantically close to the current image using the KDTree algorithm and image vectors
image.unique_properties_tooltip: Display properties related to instances of this image
image.similarity_filter_tooltip: The minimum similarity percentage that images displayed here must have. For more information, see the documentation on the similarity score.
image.toggle_property_tooltip: Show / Hide this property in the 'Similar images' view
image.fill_property_tooltip: Tag all similar images with the value of this property

properties.title: New property
properties.string_tooltip: Text, e.g. tweet content, image description
properties.number_tooltip: Numbers, e.g. the number of likes on twitter, the width of a table
properties.tag_tooltip: A single label chosen from a list, e.g. an image category, a location, a source
properties.multi_tags_tooltip: Like a label but with the possibility of assigning several at the same time
properties.url_tooltip: A clickable URL, e.g. the link to the source of an image
properties.date_tooltip: A date in dd / mm / yyyy format
properties.color_tooltip: A simple colored square to categorize without assigning a label

tagging.title: Properties
tagging.erase_tooltip: Erase this field for whole selection
